description: The Millenium Villages Project developed an mHealth platform named RapidReponse in collaboration with UNICEF.RapidResponse uses SMS text messages to facilitate and coordinate the activities of field based health care providers, usually community health care workers (CHWs). name: Vitality
description: Vitality GlowCaps are Internet-connected pill bottle caps designed to promote medication adherence. GlowCaps use light, sound, phone calls or text messages to remind users to adhere to their prescription regimen. Each time the pill bottle is opened, adherence data is relayed to Vitality and used to automatically refill prescriptions. Progress reports are sent to patients, caregivers and family members for increased social support and doctor accountability.
